segments.text: If I can improve my vertical jump a few more inches , I think beach volleyball might be my ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But whenever we play , you just sit on the sand , drink beer , and watch the girls !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a beautiful sport , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I don't think you could even win a gold in hopscotch !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , OK . Enough already . We'd better hustle . The contest starts in five minutes .
segments.speaker: S1
